name: Mouse Power!!!
description:
Power Mouse is a Platformer game where you play the role of a rat called Tinto Gradual. You have to overcome each level with the upgrade you got from the previos level. You start with the walking skill but you will end even with the Fly skill.

History:

Strange things are happening in the underground.....

Some says there are aliens down there... some others say that strange experiments are taking place in the sewers....

But a little rat will notice the truth:

a lot of nuclear companies are discarding tons of radioactive material into the sewers. Some of those materials are affecting different things, including food that a rat eats normally.

Tinto Gradual, a standard rat will soon face his destiny, the first moment that he eats the first radioactive element..... after that, his live will be never be the same!

This Game is part of the Unity 2D Game Design and Development Diploma, in Arkde, Bogotá, Colombia.
